Function reference

Datasets

Cauquenes7336001
Hydrometeorological time series for "Cauquenes en El Arrayan" catchment
EbroPPtsMonthly
Ebro Monthly Precipitation Time Series
KarameaAtGorgeQts
Karamea at Gorge, time series of hourly streamflows
MaquehueTemuco
San Martino, ts of daily precipitation.
OcaEnOnaQts
Oca in "Ona" (Q0931), time series of daily streamflows.
SanMartinoPPts
San Martino, ts of daily precipitation.

Temporal aggregation

annualfunction()
Annual Function
weeklyfunction()
Weekly Function
monthlyfunction()
Monthly Function
seasonalfunction()
Seasonal Function
daily2annual() subdaily2annual() monthly2annual()
(sub)Daily/Monthly -> Annual
daily2monthly() subdaily2monthly()
(sub)Daily -> Monthly
daily2weekly()
Daily -> Weekly
dm2seasonal() subdaily2seasonal()
(sub)Daily/Monthly -> Seasonal Values
subdaily2daily()
Sub-daily -> Daily
subdaily2weekly()
Subdaily -> Weekly
subhourly2hourly()
Sub-hourly -> Hourly
subhourly2nminutes()
Sub-hourly -> n-minutes

Temporal manipulation

dip()
Days in Period
diy()
Days in Year
hip()
Hours in Period
mip()
Months in Period
yip()
Years in Period

Hydrological functions

baseflow()
Baseflow
calendarHeatmap()
Calendar heatmap
climograph()
Climograph
dwdays()
Amount of dry/wet days in a time series
fdc()
Flow Duration Curve
fdcu()
Flow Duration Curve with uncertainty bounds.
hydropairs()
Visual Correlation Matrix
hydroplot() sname2plot()
Hydrological time series plotting and extraction.
matrixplot()
Matrixplot
plot_pq()
Plot precipitation and streamflow time series in the same figure.
si()
Seasonality Index
sname2ts()
Station Name -> Time Series
zoo2RHtest()
Zoo -> RHTest

Miscelaneous functions

cmv()
Counting Missing Values
drawxaxis()
Customized Time Axis
dwi()
Days with Information
extract()
Extract from Zoo
hydroTSM-package hydroTSM
Management, analysis, interpolation and plot of hydrological time series, with focus on hydrological modelling
infillxy()
Infills NA values
istdx()
Inverse Standarization
izoo2rzoo()
Irregular Zoo -> Regular Zoo
ma()
Moving Average
rm1stchar()
Remove First Character(s)
sfreq()
Sampling Frequency
smry()
Summary
stdx()
Standarization
time2season()
Date/DateTime character -> Seasonal character
vector2zoo()
Vector -> Zoo
